# Package import


```{r load packages, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

temp <- sapply(list.files("../functions", full.names = TRUE), source)

processors <- 8

```


```{r dir create}

results.dir <- normalizePath(file.path("../../results"))
j.p.res.dir <- file.path(results.dir, "j-p-data-preprocessing")

create.dirs(c(
))

```


# Merge all data


```{r fasta data}


all.iupred2.dt <- 
    file.path(j.p.res.dir, "IUPRED2_per_protein_and_position.csv") %>%
    fread

k.ratio.dt <- 
    file.path(j.p.res.dir, "K_ratio_per_protein_and_position.csv") %>%
    fread

all.biophysic.dt <- fread(file.path(j.p.res.dir, "biophysical_propety.csv"))
setnames(all.biophysic.dt, "Position", "position")

all.protein.feature.per.pos.dt <- merge(
    all.iupred2.dt,
    k.ratio.dt,
    by = c("Accession", "uniprot_id", "position"),
    all = TRUE
) %>%
    merge(
        all.biophysic.dt,
        by = c("Accession", "position"),
        all = TRUE
    )

brd.feature.per.pos.dt <- all.protein.feature.per.pos.dt[grepl("BRD[[:digit:]]", Accession)]


```

# Export data


```{r export data}

fwrite(
    all.protein.feature.per.pos.dt,
    file.path(j.p.res.dir, "all_protein_feature_per_position.csv")
)

fwrite(
    brd.feature.per.pos.dt,
    file.path(j.p.res.dir, "BRDs_feature_per_position.csv")
)


```
